about_the_game:

But to be honest, I don't care about you. I love money. Nothings turns me on more than an obedient pay-piggy who gives me regular cash-tributes.

Don't deny the truth. You always wanted to degrade yourself even more. I'm giving you that opportunity.

■ Full compatibility with previous outfit packs.
